issue.title: [JS] Update Flatbuffers per metadata changes in ARROW-1785
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1898](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1898). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[~paul.e.taylor] or `[~bhulette]` can you take a look at this? We should also remove the V3 metadata backwards compatibility hack as part of this. We can release JS again after the main 0.8.0 release is out

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1898?focusedCommentId=16349651) by Paul Taylor (paul.e.taylor):*
resolved in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1482
